main.profile_description: Software Developer @Trèfle Applications | Vue.js, Python & Power BI | Building web tools and smart automations for business efficiency

experiences.title: JUNIOR DATA ANALYST/IT SUPPORT
experiences.address: Chemin Vingt Pieds, Grand Baie, Mauritius
description: Developed SQL queries using SSMS to support internal reporting.
Created Table-Valued Functions (TVFs) to simplify and reuse SQL logic.
Designed automated workflows using Ultimus BPM Suite to streamline business processes.
Developed reports using SSRS for operational and analytical needs.
Collaborated with business users to gather and understand business requirements.
Improved problem-solving and analytical skills in IT support tasks.

experiences.title: IT SUPPORT TECHNICIAN/SOFTWARE DEVELOPER
description: Managed servers(Linux and Windows) and IT devices for clients, ensuring stable operations and security.
Set up laptops, created and managed user accounts on servers.
Created and administered Office 365 accounts for users.
Analyzed and troubleshoot hardware and software issues across devices.
Managed telephone lines and provided technical setup for meetings.
Implemented a secure payment system (MPGS) in the client’s e-commerce website.
Developed SQL queries and scheduled automated jobs to execute them.
Build and deploy Power BI reports tailored to client requirements.

experiences.title: SOFTWARE DEVELOPER
experiences.address: 16 bis quai de Stalingrad, 92100 Boulogne-Billancourt, France - Remote
description: Working with Flask and Vue.js frameworks for web development.
Developed a ticketing system and a commercial tool to manage sales activities.
Developed SQL queries to build Power BI reports to client requirements.
Created Python scripts to automate client tasks and improve efficiency.
APIs integration into systems and ensuring their secure usage.
Developed a BIM 360 file management tool using Python for a client.
Maintaining automation workflows to ensure reliability and performance.
